name: Don't Spill - Water Drop Challenge
description:
Welcome To "Don't Spill" or, as it is called, Water Drop Challenge!

This game is intended for 2 or more players.  The main purpose of the game is.... mmm, to have fun with your friends. Simple rule, each player will try to fill the cup by avoiding spilling. At the same time, each player will try to leave the level of the water at the level,  where it will be risky to take action for the next player.  Whoever spills the water loses the game.  And well you know losers get the punishment :D

Features:

- Fun game to play with friends whenever and wherever you want

- Different type of objects to choose from, each with specific properties (water, lava, etc.) and more coming soon

- Simple game control

- More content and visual improvements will be in the upcoming updates

Note: I will be happy to hear any suggestions regarding the game improvement. 

Any donation is valuable and  will be spent on the development of current and future games. Thank you in advance <3

Hope you enjoy!
